summary: Provides an asynchronous WebSocket client for the BingX cryptocurrency exchange, handling subscription to and parsing of real‑time market streams (order books, trades, tickers) as well as private user streams (orders, balances) with caching and error management.
business_intent: Allows developers to integrate live BingX market and account data into trading bots, analytics platforms, or other applications that require low‑latency, real‑time cryptocurrency information.
